verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.
verse.verse_2: And I swear by the blaming soul.
verse.verse_3: Does man think that We will not reassemble his bones?
verse.verse_4: Yes indeed; We are Able to reconstruct his fingertips.
verse.verse_5: But man wants to deny what is ahead of him.
verse.verse_6: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
verse.verse_9: And the sun and the moon are joined together.
verse.verse_10: On that Day, man will say, "Where is the escape?"
verse.verse_11: No indeed! There is no refuge.
verse.verse_12: To your Lord on that Day is the settlement.
verse.verse_13: On that Day man will be informed of everything he put forward, and everything he left behind.
verse.verse_14: And man will be evidence against himself.
verse.verse_15: Even as he presents his excuses.
verse.verse_16: Do not wag your tongue with it, to hurry on with it.
verse.verse_17: Upon Us is its collection and its recitation.
verse.verse_18: Then, when We have recited it, follow its recitation.
verse.verse_19: Then upon Us is its explanation.
verse.verse_20: Alas, you love the fleeting life.
verse.verse_22: Faces on that Day will be radiant.
verse.verse_24: And faces on that Day will be gloomy.
verse.verse_25: Realizing that a back-breaker has befallen them.
verse.verse_26: Indeed, when it has reached the breast-bones.
verse.verse_27: And it is said, "Who is the healer?"
verse.verse_28: And He realizes that it is the parting.
verse.verse_29: And leg is entwined with leg.
verse.verse_30: To your Lord on that Day is the drive.
verse.verse_32: But he denied and turned away.
verse.verse_33: Then he went to his family, full of pride.
verse.verse_35: Then again: Woe to you; and woe.
verse.verse_36: Does man think that he will be left without purpose?
verse.verse_37: Was he not a drop of ejaculated semen?
verse.verse_38: Then he became a clot. And He created and proportioned?
verse.verse_39: And made of him the two sexes, the male and the female?
verse.verse_40: Is He not Able to revive the dead?
